title: REFERENCE_RANGE<DV_COUNT>
$comments: Defined in Data_types IM, inherits from REFERENCE_RANGE

meaning.description: Term whose value indicates the meaning of this range, e.g.  normal,  critical,  therapeutic  etc.

range.description: The data range for this meaning, e.g. critical  etc.

is_in_range.description: Indicates if the value  val' is inside the range.

$invariants.Range_is_simple: (range.lower_unbounded or else range.lower.is_simple) and (range.upper_unbounded or else range.upper.is_simple)
